### üì¶ Installation

**For New Users:**
1. Download `Usage4Claude-v{{VERSION}}.dmg` below
2. Open the DMG file
3. Drag app to Applications folder
4. Right-click and select "Open" on first launch

**For Existing Users:**
1. Download the new version
2. Replace the old app in Applications
3. All your settings will be preserved

---
